text: William Joseph Casey (March 13, 1913 â€“ May 6, 1987) was an American politician. He was the Director of Central Intelligence from 1981 to 1987 under Ronald Reagan. In this capacity he oversaw the entire United States Intelligence Community and personally directed the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA). Casey was born on March 13, 1913 in Elmhurst, Queens, New York.
